item.title: Virtualenv_intro
item.description: Using virtualenv cli tool for managing virtual enviroments in python Why to use virtualenv instead of any other tool Virtualenv is light weight Doesn’t come with all the hassle in other tools created for one purpose only creating virtualenv Have some nice features first feature second one third Installation: pip install virtualenv Usage: virtualenv --python=/your/python/version/dir name_of_env

item.title: About me
item.description: Here is a quick intro about me My names is Ahmed Mohamed Elshrbiny, I’ve a BCs degree in Computer Science, I’m so passionate about technology related topics. Currently, I’m a Junior machine learning engineer with a good experience related to Software development in general.
